title: mockito-errorprone seems not compatible with ErrorProne 2.11.0
body:
We use mockito-errorprone of version 4.3.1 and it seems not compatible with ErrorProne of version 2.11.0.

Our compilation got broken when we updated ErrorProne to 2.11.0 with such error:
```
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: 'com.google.errorprone.matchers.method.MethodMatchers$ParameterMatcher com.google.errorprone.matchers.method.MethodMatchers$MethodNameMatcher.withParameters(java.lang.String[])'
	at org.mockito.errorprone.bugpatterns.MockitoAnyIncorrectPrimitiveType.<clinit>(MockitoAnyIncorrectPrimitiveType.java:52)
```

<details>
  <summary>Take a look at the full error log</summary>

